name: Rampage of the Dead
description: Rampage of the Dead is an arcade FPS endless wave shooter! Will you be able to survive the wrath of the enemies or they will take over you? Defend yourself and show them... show them all...
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 - 64 Bits Processor: Intel I5 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 TI or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 - 64 Bits Processor: Intel I7 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 4 GB available space
